_comment: Quick configuration with point crossover and parameter mutation
_comment_profile: Fast execution with conservative exploration - point crossover preserves tree structure while parameter mutation only adjusts terminals

_comment_crossover_descriptions.point: Exchanges nodes at corresponding positions between trees

_comment_mutation_descriptions.parameter: Only mutates terminal nodes (features and constants)

_comment_performance_notes.mutation_focus: Parameter mutation ensures minimal disruption to tree structure
